https://www.studioneat.com/products/mark.description: Mark One is a custom machined, all-metal, retractable pen with a ceramic based exterior coating for long lasting durability. It’s built for our favorite rollerball refill, and has a satisfying-as-heck custom click mechanism.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/mark.tagline: A Minimal and Durable Pocket Pen
https://www.studioneat.com/products/mark.description: Mark Two is a custom machined, all-metal pocket pen small enough to take with you, but extends to a full length when in use. Built to last a lifetime, it comes with a special mini version of our favorite rollerball refill.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/mate.description: Turn your MagSafe connector into a stationary dock for your iPhone. These bring-your-own-cable walnut docks create a lovely place to charge your iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/pano.description: Panobook is a panoramic notebook for your desk, and eventually, your shelf. Made of quality materials and thoughtful details, and includes a slipcase for archiving when you’re finished.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/mark.tagline: A Minimal and Durable Mechanical Pencil
https://www.studioneat.com/products/mark.description: Mark Three is a custom machined mechanical pencil with a ceramic based exterior coating for long lasting durability. It comes with 0.7 mm lead, but it’s easy to swap in a 0.5 mm lead advancer.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/tote.tagline: A Notebook to Take With You
https://www.studioneat.com/products/tote.description: Totebook is a thin, light, and flexible notebook, perfect for tucking in your bag to bring with you. Made of quality materials and thoughtful details, and includes a spine sticker for labeling and archiving. Comes in two sizes.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/pano.tagline: A Panoramic Scratch Pad for Your Desk.
https://www.studioneat.com/products/pano.description: Panopad is a low profile, large format sticky pad for your desk. Made of quality paper and a thoughtful dot grid, use it as a scratch pad or to stick your ideas to the wall. Comes as a 2-pack.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/pent.tagline: Walnut Desk Trays for Your Pens
https://www.studioneat.com/products/pent.description: Give your writing utensils a lovely home on your desk. Milled from a solid piece of walnut, right here in Austin, Texas.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/glif.description: The all-new and completely redesigned version of the Glif holds your smartphone securely in portrait or landscape with a quick release lever, and includes three tripod mounts for additional accessories.
variants: Full Set (Glif + Hand Grip + Wrist Strap)

https://www.studioneat.com/products/cano.description: Canopy is a case for your Apple Magic Keyboard that folds open to create a stand for your iPad or iPhone. Now you can use a full size, honest-to-god keyboard with your device.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/cosm.description: The Cosmonaut was born out of our desire to have a really great stylus for our iPads. A stylus that just feels right.

https://www.studioneat.com/products/remo.tagline: Walnut Stand for the Apple TV Remote
https://www.studioneat.com/products/remo.description: You're going to lose your remote. We made this little walnut stand so your Apple TV remote always has a home. Peace of mind.
